title: Average sales per unit of Outback Steakhouse restaurants in the U.S. 2015 to 2018
yAxis: Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars has stayed the same over the Year.
Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, and finally slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars, of value 3542.0 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars about 3354.0 was reached at Year 2016
